description: Number of different necklaces with 6 beads of n colors, allowing turning over.
comments: Number of ways to color vertices of a hexagon using <= n colors, allowing rotations and reflections.Equivalently, the number of distinct hexagons that can be tiled using equilateral triangles of n different colors. - _Lekraj Beedassy_, Dec 29 2007
